::Dion::

Dion looks out of the nearest viewhole at the shrinking Cybertron, sighing. He remembered the last time he had left the planet....

His spark heavy, looks the planet over, picking out a particular sector on it and feeling his emotion centers almost overload. So many things he could have done differently, and yet it ended up like this. Him leaving Cybertron as a drunk. He could have still been an officer, if only he'd been more careful.

"I need a drink," he mumbles to himself as he walks away from the viewhole after taking a last longing look at the sector that he'd been staring at and burning the whole of Cybertron into his memory. There was nothing for him there anyways, though. He shouldn't have been feeling that way. He walks around the ship, looking for any sort of food/drink despencer.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> --- JetV / Pacifix / Ikoto / Soundwave ---
> 
> JetV initiates the cloaking device on the medium sized stealth 
> cruiser, and begins to increase the speed of the ship. Hidden One 
> begins to takes off of the planet in a relatively silent launch.
> 
> Soundwave watches the other DED members lose intrest in him, and he 
> sneaks off to the pod that the Council wants him to bring aboard. 
> <<This will be tricky...>> he thinks to himself, <<Here we go...>> He 
> watches carefully, and then wheels the pot towards the ship's storage 
> bay, when the others aren't looking. He then loads it on, and 
> proceeds to cover it up. He hops out of the storage, and joins the 
> group as silently as he had left. "DED, are we leaving? Radar shows 
> that the Autobots are on the move." 
> 
> OOC: Hurry up Jer, DED must leave soon! =)
>
